name: RedBytes Software
description:
Redbytes software is a mobile app development company focused on generating value for its customers with its excellent end to end capabilities in delivering mobile solutions. Redbytes software was founded in 2009 by a small and energetic group of marketing and technology visionaries who were all part of the finance enterprise technology, having years of experience in business analysis, project management, and offshore management.
Who we are :
> Mobile App Development Company focusing on creating value for our customers
> We deliver the best at effective price.
> Experience in developing 200+ mobile applications.
> Ensure 100% quality and commitment with us
> We are official ambassadors of Corona SDK (a cross platform mobile development tool) in India.  We rank 4th in Ambassador's Directory.
> We have been featured in CNBC young Turks for our innovative approach.
What we do :
> Custom games Educational apps Business solutions
>We work both on contract and consulting basis
> As a team, we hire quality professionals and deliver the best solutions to our customers
> We love to solve business problems, create new opportunities and help brands create their mark on the growing mobile platform.
> We take pride in our work, ensuring that every small detail passes our high standards.
> Our vision is to provide SMB’s the competitive advantage that bigger enterprises command by providing them top-notch IT services and solutions at the most competitive prices.
